turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I'd like to order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, where did you want to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Caffè Americano, Tall.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. But could I get regular cream and sugar?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any whipped cream or syrups with that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a Tall Caffe Americano with cream and sugar from the Starbucks on mill street in Guerneville.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, it will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes and you'll get the receipt via text.
